titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

Henry W. 243 rue St Jacques. Jan 22 paid dep. 60 and extra 60 120 Jan 23 SB ref 30 balalance -90 Jan 25 ref 30 balance 60 1 m 2 v 20 (left dep) dep 60 extra " 60 Jan 29 Autobiography of Lord Alfred Douglas Lorenzo in Taos Jan 25 Jan 23 Jan 23 Erewhon Feb 1 25 Women in Love Jan 29 29 Selected Essays 3 Feb Feb 1 Fragments from Work in Progress Feb 5 3 " Opening of a door Feb 5 Feb 5 Idiot Feb 13 Literary Mind ren Feb 27 13 Light in August Feb 27 Renewed Feb 22 - March 22 2 v 20v

Dostoievsky (Gide) 1 Dec. 28 Harlan Minors Speak (loaned to Gide returned by Wibbelz 14 Feb Concise English Grammar 19v Dec 13 credit American Song. 28v Jan 4 Plagued by the Nightingale 22 Jan 23 Year before last 28 28 Jude the obscure 6 Feb 28 Little Nugget (extra) 0.50 11 - 28 Lunatic at large " 29 29 Can such things be 0.50 6 Feb. 29 Petronius (Loeb) 0.50 8f 6 Feb 29 Over the footlights 0.50 (1) 6 - 6 Feb _ Crime + punishment 16 March Subscription due - 22 January -- 26 March _ House of the dead 3 May wrote Feb 22 Decline of the West arrears 92.50 June 8 Origin of Magic + Religion M.
